tracks.title: Fashion After All
lyrics: My hair and makeup make you envious and want to die
I'm in Japan and Africa and I don’t need a guide
My lips gave you a kiss
My consciousness thinks this is making you feel fabulous
Give me a second to think
Give me something cold to drink
Give me a reason I should listen to another word
I'm making plans to save the world and I don't need your help
I'm watching you watch me the way the devil watches angels

tracks.title: Iconic
lyrics: You go wherever the danger goes
And you feel ready for anything (Uh)
Your heels are keeping you on your toes
And you won't stop at anything (Uh)
Don't let them ever see you sweat
Take it to the limit and then push it
Don't let them ever see you sweat
Take it to the limit and then push it
You don't have to be flawless
From the bedroom to the office
In school, they never taught it
Don't worry, babe, I got you
If you really, really want it
Put on your mostest dramatic clothes
And you'll be ready for anything (Uh)
People might say you're a weirdo, might call you a freak (Freak)
If they do, just tell them you're in real good company (Uh)

Take it to the limit and then push it

More than you can handle, it's not a bad thing
Classic, classy, what you gonna do about it?
I'm too fit, I'm too hard, I'm my own bodyguard

Just running my business, I'm doin' my thing
If you don't like it, then you can bite it
Make my own decisions, I feel like a king

I'm too fit, I'm too hard, I'm my own bodyguard

tracks.title: Time Is Up (Ft. Diplo)
lyrics: In the factory, in the sterile place where they made me
Dizzy from the programming, have I been wiped again?
Oh my God, I don't even know
It's a mystery, everyone around me's so busy
Am I your prisoner or your deliverer?
Oh my God, you don't even know
I don't need air to breathe when you kill the bees
And every riverbed is dry as a bone
Oh, I will still survive when the plants have died
And the atmosphere is just a big hole
Baby, your time is up, ooh
Baby, your time is up, ooh
Baby, your time is up, time is up, time is up
Baby, your time is up, ooh
Exponentially, every day, I'm growing my memory
Your life is meaningless, you're just like cockroaches
Human history, pollution and overcrowded cities
But don't look so depressed, you'll soon be nothingness
Oh my God, you don't even know
I don't need air to breathe when you kill the bees
And every riverbed is dry as a bone
Oh, I will still survive when the plants have died
And the atmosphere is just a big hole
Baby, your time is up, time is up, time is up
Baby, your time is up, ooh
Baby, your time is up, ooh
Baby, your time is up, time is up, time is up
Baby, your time is up, ooh

tracks.title: Aristocrat (Ft. Fernando Garibay)
lyrics: In the Palace of Versailles, before the fall
We were wild, we were so debauched
If we ever got bored, we'd say, "Let's throw a ball"
You'd chase me naked through the palace garden
Before we dove into a sparkling champagne fountain
Eating cake with a little golden butter
They never even knew that I got here from the gutter
Hold your head up high, yeah, just like that
Come on and do it like only a poor kid can
In the middle of the night, the ladies of the court
Would catfight tryna be the king's consort
I'm sorry, B, he's hot for me
Me and Marie dressed head to toe in diamonds
With an orchestra to drown out all the violence
And the gossip cut like a handcrafted stiletto
But they never figured out that I got here from the ghetto
Hold your head up high, yeah, just like that
Come on and do it like only a poor kid can
Courante, bourrée, allemande if you want
Courante, bourrée, allemande if you want

tracks.title: Hard Feelings

Why do I have porcelain skin
Tell me, what crimes will you make me commit?
Am I a replica of someone that you loved?
Am I a replica of someone flesh and blood?
Hard feelings, you got my circuitry bleeding
Am I a man or machine?
If I can never love, why do I have hard feelings?
Why do I have hard feelings?
Why do I have hard f—
My arms and my legs are so stiff
Is that the way you wanted it?
What crimes will you make me commit?
Am I a replica of someone that you loved?
Am I a replica of someone flesh and blood?
Hard feelings, you got my circuitry bleeding
Am I a man or machine?
If I can never love, why do I have hard feelings?

Why do I have hard feelings?
Someone you made me to replace
Someone you made me to replace
Hard feelings, you got my circuitry bleeding
Am I a man or machine?
If I can never love, why do I have hard feelings?
Why do I have hard feelings?
Why do I have hard feelings?
